subject: Dead Sensor
caption: Dead sensor at I2
description: The sensor at the I2 element died late on 2020-11-30 and remains dead through the end of the reporting period.

subject: Dead broadband sensor
description: All 3 channels of the broadband sensor at FSAH1 are not recording ground motions. We have approached Randy about this sensor but it is not resolved. This ticket remains open.

subject: Dead broadband sensor
description: Keeping this ticket open for a dead broadband sensor. Added the 'dead' threshold, based on the 'dead_channel_gsn' metric. Appears to be working properly.

subject: Dead sensor on the I2 element
caption: PDF showing dead sensor at I2
description: The I2 element appears to have a dead sensor. Problem appears to hace started late on 2020-11-30.

subject: Elevated noise on broadband
description: All 3 broadband channels exceeded the 'hiAmp' threshold. This issues has been corrected in our metadata inventory and will soon be installed. However, the ticket will remain open until the station passes thresholds. NOTE: the 'badresp' metric was used for the first time this week, and it succesfully flagged this station.

subject: Gaps
caption: Plot showing large number at KDAK broadband;;;;;;;;
description: There were many gaps on all 3 channels of the broadband at KDAK on 2020-12-06

subject: Gaps
caption: Waveform showing typical gap pattern for CDF channels.;;;;Daily number of gaps for the ADKI.01 element. Pattern in similar for all elements.;;;;Number of gaps affects percent_availability for all elements.
description: All elements of the ADKI array exhibit large numbers of gaps in the CDF channels for the entire reporting period. Daily number of gaps appear to spike on 2020-11-20 and 2020-11-21. These gaps continue, but metric generation for these channels will cease until they can by down-sampled.

subject: Gaps
caption: Low-data availability towards the end of the reporting period at H1. All channels of the array exhibit a similar pattern;;;;Low data availability at I53 channels were associated with a single large gap for each day
description: There were large gaps for all channels of all elements on 2020-11-27 - 2020-11-29

subject: Gaps
caption: Comparison of IRIS-downloaded vs WATC-downloaded waveforms for ELK.BHZ showing gaps in WATC data but not in IRIS;;;;Daily number of gaps on BHZ. Similar numbers for all components
description: All broadband channels at US.ELK exhibit high numbers of gaps for the entire reporting period. The same data from the IRIS FDSN do not exhibit gaps. There appears to be a communication error at some point. Gaps continuing through the current reporting period.

subject: Gaps and Outage
caption: ;;;;Plot showing numerous gaps at DLLH1 on 2020-11-30
description: There were numerous gaps on elements 1 and 2 for the reporting period.

subject: Large gaps
caption: All elements experienced low availability on the 23 and 24;;;;
description: Large gaps and low data availability continued into this reporting period on all elements. There was low availability on 2020-11-23 and 2020-11-24.

subject: Low Data Availability
caption: Plot showing low availability during the 1st half of the reporting period
description: Low availability for the San Juan broadband continued into this reporting period. Improved during the second half of the week.

subject: Malfunctioning weather station at FSAH2.M1
caption: Waveform showing digitizer noise from the met channels
description: Continued dead channels for the met sensor at this station.

subject: Metada problem on shortperiod
caption: Figure showing undefined values on the short-period seismometer inventory
description: The orientation is undefined of the short-period seismometer

subject: Metadata issue
caption: Spectra showing probable metadata issue;;;;;;;;
description: Metadata issue known from the start of this reporting period (but is seen in previous week).

subject: Metadata problem
description: Orientation is undefined for braodband horizontal channels

subject: Metadata problems
caption: PDF showing mid-period noise dipping below the nlnm;;;;;;;;
description: The noise spectra for the 3-component short-period sensor at this site show significant mid-period energy below the noise model, indicating that there may be a problem with the response. Also, azimuth and dip are undefined for the vertical channel.

subject: Noise on Broadband
caption: Continuing to see mass recenter and calibration change.
description: Re-opening this ticket as the 'hiAmp' threshold was exceeded on 2020-11-15. While there continues to be elevated mid-period noise, threshold exceedance usually seems to be associated with mass recenters. There has been once a week for the last 2 weeks. I'll keep this ticket open and keep an eye on the mrcs going forward. Re-opened this ticket as there have been continued mass recenters that exceeded the hiamp threshold.

subject: Transient Noise
caption: Spectra showing transient noise
description: These elements continue to experience transien noise. Particularly on the 2020-11-30.

subject: Transient Noise
caption: Waveforms showing transient noise recoded on several FSA sites on 2020-11-27
description: Transient noise was visible on all infrasound elements of this station on the 23, 24, 27, and 28. The noise was apparent at several FSA sites at these times and is most likely associated with wind. These channels continued to experience noise, particularly on 2020-11-30.

subject: Transient Noise
description: This element experienced transient noise on 2020-11-27. This noise was apparent at other FSA sites at this time and appears to be associated with a wind event.

subject: Transient Noise
description: This element broke the hiamp threshold on 2020-11-27. This appears associated with a wind event that was also apparent at other FSA sites.

subject: Transient Noise
description: Elements 3 and 4 exceeded the hiamp threshold on 2020-11-27. This noise was apparent at other FSA sites and is most likely associated with a wind event. Sporadic transient noise in continuing into this reporting period.

subject: Transient Noise on Infrasound
caption: Raw waveforms at FSAH2 showing that transient noise is present on all elements;;;;PDF showing noise at FSAH2
description: All elements were noisy enough to break the hiamp threshold on the 2020-11-30 and 2020-12-02.  This noise appears transient and is likely associated with wind events.

subject: Undefined Azimuth and Dip
caption: Dip and azimuth are undefined for the broadband horizontal channels
description: Both the azimuth and dip are undefined for the horizontal channels of the FSAH5 broadband.
